mapper.select: SELECT role.ID ROLEID,role.ROLENAME,role.PRIORITY,permission.ID PERMISSIONID,permission.PERMISSIONNAME,permission.TYPEID FROM hm_pub_role role LEFT JOIN hm_pub_role_permission role_permission ON role.ID = role_permission.ROLEID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_permission permission ON role_permission.PERMISSIONID=permission.ID WHERE role.COMPANYID=#{companyId}
